pros: Comfy for recovery days; Excellent walking shoe; Soft upper; Breathable for summer runs; Perfect for beginners; Affordable price; Upper made with recycled plastic
cons: A no-no for wide feet; Hard to put on for some
RR_verdict: The Adidas Questar is a road running shoe that's perfect for beginners and casual runners who want a comfortable, easy-pace running shoe. We found it quite comfortable and not hurting the feet at all. Even better, it doesn't hurt the wallet with its price tag either. Overall, if you want a versatile running shoe that's perfect for daily runs and long walks, we believe that the Questar will do the job.
use: Jogging |, Treadmill |, Walking |, All-day wear |, For beginners
